price: And when they are thrown into a narrow space therein, chained together, they will cry out for death.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ مِنۡهَا مَكَانٗا ضَيِّقٗا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡاْ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
